page.title: 15HEALTH
page.content: People are very aware of the need to take care of their bodies.It is a very common sight to see people jogging through the villages and countryside intending to keep themselves fit and slim.Many of the clubs and societies are well attended because of peoples desire to keep themselves fit.The ladies attend a Swing into Shape class once a week in the Community centres while the men attend Karate and Weight training classes. Doctors surgeries are housed within the villages and these are very convenient.If one is unwell you either visit the doctor at the surgery or if you are very ill the doctor will visit you at home.Medicine can also be dispenced at the Hathern surgery.Any problem the doctor is unsure about is referred to the hospital.
